Package br.com.concepting.framework.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.util.StringUtil
  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible to manipulate strings.

      • indent

        public static <R extends BaseIndent> java.lang.String indent​(java.lang.String value,
                                                             java.util.Collection<R> rules)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                                             java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                             java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                             java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                             java.lang.InstantiationException
        Indents a string based on a list of indentation rules.
        Type Parameters:
        R - Class that defines the indentation rule.
        Parameters:
        value - String that will be used.
        rules - List that contains the indentation rules
        Returns:
        Indented string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
        java.lang.InstantiationException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
